dcterms:creator: N. Harte
E. Gillen
dcterms:description: This corpus consists of synchronized audio-visual recordings of 59 speakers reading sentences from the TIMIT corpus. TCD-TIMIT is collected in a controlled environment, thus comprising high-quality audio and video clips of speech.
dcterms:title: TCD-TIMIT

dcterms:creator: T. Afouras
J. S. Chung
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: LRS3 is a large-scale audio-visual corpus obtained from TED and TEDx talks, collected in the wild, resulting in a lower quality of samples compared to TCD-TIMIT but with tremendous variability in spoken sentences, visual appearances, and speaking styles.
dcterms:title: LRS3

dcterms:creator: J. Garofolo
D. Graff
D. Paul
D. Pallett
dcterms:description: Created from the WSJ0 corpus, WSJ0Mix comprises audio signals only, specifically designed for single-channel 2 and 3 speaker mixtures, mixed with a signal-to-interference ratio (SIR) randomly sampled from âˆ’5 dB to 5 dB.
dcterms:title: WSJ0Mix

dcterms:creator: J. Cosentino
M. Pariente
S. Cornell
A. Deleforge
E. Vincent
dcterms:description: LibriMix is an audio-only dataset that comprises 2-speaker and 3-speaker mixtures created from the LibriSpeech corpus, with mixtures following a normal distribution of SIR.
dcterms:title: LibriMix
